headline.main: FRESH NAZI TROOPS RUSHED TO RUMANIA; Reich's Mechanized Forces in Bucharest Parade--Iron Guard Curbed by Sima

lead_paragraph: MAROS-VASARHELY, Hungary, at the Rumanian Border, Dec. 2-- Troop trains bearing four fresh German divisions to Rumania sped through Hungary today under circumstances suggesting that Germany was preparing to halt the disorders sweeping parts of that country unless the Rumanians themselves acted effectively.
